name: Connection to Others: Light of Truth

system.description:
At 3rd level, your chosen focus on light or dark becomes more powerful.

Light of Truth

If you choose Path of the Light, you now emit bright light to a range of 30 feet and dim light to a range of 60 feet. You may suppress this light at will (no action required) and reactivate it as a bonus action. While this light is active, you have advantage on Insight checks against creatures within the area of bright light. In addition, creatures observing illusions within the area of the bright light have advantage on saves to disbelieve them.
